Introduction
This topic contains information on adjusting an award when a Veteran is discharged from, granted an authorized absence from, or returns after an absence from a hospital, including
resuming the payment of benefits at the A&A rate upon discharge from a hospital
adjusting for hospital absences of 30 days or more
actions to take when
an authorized absence of 30 days or more occurs during an initial period of hospitalization
, and
a Veteran returns from an authorized absence of 30 days or more
example of a report of a 30-day authorized absence received during an initial period of hospitalization
retroactive adjustments for hospital absences of less than 30 days
, and
readmission for hospitalization following an irregular discharge
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section C  - Adjusting Awards Involving an Aid and Attendance (A&A) Allowance
citation: Part X, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section C
